perturbation.original_text: The Covenanter: The HUANG JIA Country CLUB and Recreation Inc. (hereinafter referred to as Party A) and the Covenanter: Chang Chen- Bin Architects Office (hereinafter referred to as Party B) hereby agree to establish the following terms and conditions with regard to the development of Miaoli Royal Resort Hotel:
perturbation.changed_text: The Covenanter: The HUANG JIA Country CLUB and Recreation Inc. (hereinafter referred to as the Client) and the Covenanter: Chang Chen- Bin Architects Office (hereinafter referred to as the Architect) hereby agree to establish the following terms and conditions with regard to the development of Miaoli Royal Resort Hotel:
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Party A' with 'the Client' and 'Party B' with 'the Architect'. These terms are used later in the document, and this change sets up a potential conflict as the later references to 'Party A' and 'Party B' are not explicitly defined as being equivalent to 'the Client' and 'the Architect'.

perturbation.original_text:
Article VIII. Duties of Party A

Party A shall provide the following data during the term mentioned above: I. Data of rights relevant to the land. II. Data required by Party B and can be provided by Party A. (I) Basic data that must be provided in accordance with relevant regulations: 1. Name and business address of the developer; 2. Full name, address and ID card number of the person in charge; 3. Purpose and content of the development.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article VIII. Duties of the Client

The Main Contractor shall provide the following data during the term mentioned above: I. Data of rights relevant to the land. II. Data required by the Architect and can be provided by the Main Contractor. (I) Basic data that must be provided in accordance with relevant regulations: 1. Name and business address of the developer; 2. Full name, address and ID card number of the person in charge; 3. Purpose and content of the development.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Party A' with 'the Client' and 'Main Contractor,' creating ambiguity. It's unclear if 'the Client' and 'Main Contractor' are the same entity, leading to confusion about who is responsible for providing the data. This now contradicts the previous definition.

perturbation.original_text:
Article IX. Duties of Party B

I. Party B shall follow all instructions of Party A and ensure all plans and designs of the project to meet relevant construction laws and regulations. II. Party B shall take on a professional attitude for various services mentioned in Article III of the Contract, maintain benefits and interests of Party A all the time and adopt the most economical option under the precondition of safety and reliability. III. Party B is obligatory to report the latest progress and completed content to Party A.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article IX. Duties of the Consultant

I. The Engineer shall follow all instructions of the Client and ensure all plans and designs of the project to meet relevant construction laws and regulations. II. The Engineer shall take on a professional attitude for various services mentioned in Article III of the Contract, maintain benefits and interests of the Client all the time and adopt the most economical option under the precondition of safety and reliability. III. The Consultant is obligatory to report the latest progress and completed content to the Main Contractor.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Party B' with 'the Consultant' and 'Engineer', and 'Party A' with 'Client' and 'Main Contractor'. It's unclear if 'the Consultant' and 'Engineer' are the same entity and who has the reporting responsibility, leading to confusion about their respective duties. This contradicts previous definitions.
